issue.title: ODE threaded islands sometimes slower on Ubuntu

content.raw:
This is to confirm that even without thread island, i.e.  $ gz physics -o unthrottled0     
The simulation is slower when close the gzclient and faster when start the gzclient    
This means this slowness when close gzclient is not only related to the number of thread island, but also an issue when we are not using thread island (unthrottled0)   
I will investigate and see how to fix this!
